item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello ¡Hola! नमस्ते Bonjour! Здравствуйте! நமஸ்காரம் ನಮಸ್ಕಾರ! നമസ്‌കാരം I learned that inertia is temporary. So, I have moved away from blogger. This is my new abode for rare to occasional technical blabberings and travelogues. The old blog is still up at vishnuvenukumar.blogspot.com - all posts intact; in case someone finds one of the random troubleshooter posts useful. I will try to move older posts here, probably during the next vacation.
